high_descs: Walk a step then turn right and face the small white end table.
Pick up the pink bar of soap.
Adjust your position so you are facing the sink.
Get the soap wet in the sink then pick it up again.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Place the soap to the left of the right candle stick on top of the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet bar of soap on the tank of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and face the soap on the small dresser.
Pick up the soap from the dresser.
Turn left and head towards the sink on your right.
Place the soap in the sink, turn on the faucet, wash the soap, turn off the faucet and pick up the soap.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Place the soap in between the two candles on the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Wash the bar soap to place it on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to the right facing the white shelf
Pick up the soap from the shelf.
Bring the soap to the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, turn on the water, turn off the water, pick up the soap in the sink.
Bring the soap over to the toilet.
Put the soap on the toilet lid.
tasks.task_desc: Put the soap on the toilet lid.

high_descs: Walk towards the shelf to your right
Take the bar of soap from the shelf
Walk to the sink to your left
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the faucet on, then turn it off
Walk to the toilet behind you
Place the bar of soap between the spray bottle and tissue box on top of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Move the soap to the toilet

high_descs: Walk forward and turn right to face the white cabinet.
Pick up the pink soap from the cabinet.
Turn left, then right to face the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, fill it with water, drain it, and take it out.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Place the pink soap on top of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean soap on a toilet.

high_descs: Move to the white cabinet.
Pick up the pink soap on the white cabinet.
Bring the soap to the sink.
Wet the soap in the sink.
Bring the soap to the toilet.
Put the soap on the toilet lid tank on the left of the tissue box.
tasks.task_desc: Put the soap on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the white tub ahead.
Pick up the black towel on the right side inside the tub.
Turn around and walk to the sink on the left.
Put the towel inside the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.
Turn around and walk to the white tub on the right.
Put the rinsed towel in the middle inside the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed towel inside a tub.

high_descs: turn right and walk straight towards the tub and look down
pick up the rag inside of the tub
turn around and walk straight and then turn left towards the sink
put the rag inside of the sink turn the water on and then drain the water and remove the rag from the sink
turn left then turn left again then turn right towards the tub and look down
put the rag down inside of the bathtub
tasks.task_desc: rinse a rag off in the sink and put it inside of the tub

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the bath tub.
Pick up the black cloth from the bath tub.
Turn right and walk to the sink in front of you.
Put the cloth in the sink, rinse it off, and take it back out.
Turn left and walk back to the bath tub.
Put the cloth back in the bath tub basin.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned cloth in a bath tub.

high_descs: Turn left, walk to the tub on the left and face the toilet on the left.
Pick up the black towel under the faucet of the tub.
Turn left and walk to the sink on the left.
Put the towel inside the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.
Turn left and walk to the tub ahead.
Put the rinsed towel inside the tub in between the black towels.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed towel in a tub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the front of the toilet.
Take the rag from under the tap in the bathtub.
Turn around and face the sink.
Put the rag in the sink, wash it off, and pick it up.
Turn left and walk to the bathtub.
Put the rag between the other two rags in the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: Replace a dirty rag from the bathtub with a clean one.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the tub, face the left side of the tub.
Pick up the rag on top of the drain in the tub.
Turn around and face the sink.
Put the rag down in the sink, rinse of the rag with water, pick up the rag from the sink.
Walk back over to the tub.
Put the rag down in the tub in between the other two rags.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse the rag and put it in the tub.

high_descs: Step forward to face the bath tub.
Pick up the dirty rag in the bath tub.
Turn around to face the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink and remove it.
Turn left to face the bath tub.
Place the rag in the center of the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: To wash a rag and place it in the bath tub.

high_descs: Move forward and turn left to face the toilet.
Pick up the cloth from inside the tub.
Carry the cloth and turn around to the sink.
Place the cloth inside the sink and turn on the water. Turn off the water and pick up the cloth.
Hold the cloth and turn to the left and face the bath tub.
Place the cloth inside the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a cloth and place it in the bath tub.

high_descs: Walk straight to the tub, turn left when you reach the tub to face the toilet.
Grab the dirty rag in the tub to your right.
Turn left and walk to the sink to your left.
Place the dirty rag in the sink, wash it and remove it.
Turn left and walk to the tub straight ahead.
Place the rag between the two bars soap in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag in the tub.

high_descs: turn right to face the bath tub, then look down a bit
grab the dirty wash cloth out of the bath tub
turn right and walk over to the right side of the sink against the wall
place the cloth inside of the sink and turn on the water, clean out the cloth and then pick it back up
turn around to face the toilet, and look upwards a bit at the back side of the toilet
place the cloth down on top of the back side of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: place a clean cloth on top of the back side of the toilet

high_descs: Turn right and face the bath tub.
Pick up the black rag in the tub.
Turn right and face the sink.
Rinse the rag in the sink.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Place the rag on the toilet in between the bars of soap.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn right and walk up to the tub.
Pick up the dirty black rag out of the tub.
Turn around and walk forward, then turn left to face the sink.
Put the dirty black rag in the sink and turn on the water, after a couple seconds turn the water off and pick up the now clean black rag.
Turn left and walk towards the tub, then turn left and walk over to the toilet.
Put the clean black rag on top of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean black rag on the toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn around and take a step then turn right and walk to the tub then turn left to face the toilet.
Pick up the wash cloth that's over the drain in the tub.
Turn around to face the sink.
Get the wash cloth wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Turn back around to face the toilet.
Put the wet wash cloth on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet wash cloth on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around, move to the tub on the right.
Pick up the black rag in the tub, closest to the faucet.
Bring the rag to the sink, right of the tub.
Wash the rag in the sink with water.
Turn around, bring the rag to the toilet.
Stand the rag on the toilet tank lid.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: walk to face top of bath tub
pick up black rag from tub basin
walk to face sink
wash and remove rag from sink
walk to face toilet
put rag on toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: put a washed rag on toilet tank

high_descs: Turn around to face the white drawers to the right of the sink.
Pick the soap up from off of the white drawers.
Turn around go straight and face the trash can to the right of the toilet.
Place the soap in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Move the soap from the white drawers to the trash can.

high_descs: Turn around to face the white dresser.
Pick up the bottle of lotion in the farther right corner on the dresser.
Turn around and walk across the room to the trash can near the toilet.
Put the bottle of lotion in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bottle of lotion in the trash can.

high_descs: Turn around and face the white cabinet behind.
Pick the gray bottle on the right up from the cabinet.
Turn around and cross the room and turn to the right to face the trash can next to the toilet.
Put the bottle in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bottle in a trash can.

high_descs: Turn right toward the bath tub.  Walk toward the bath tub and turn left facing the toilet.  Walk toward the toilet.
Pick up the soap container on the wall of the bath tub.
Turn left and walk toward the wall.  Turn right at the wall and walk toward the trash can.
Put the soap container in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Put the soap container in the trash.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the bathtub then turn left  and face the toilet
Pick up the bottle of soap that is sitting on the side of the bathtub
Turn left and head across the room then turn right and walk to the wall, turn right again to face the side of the toilet
Place the soap bottle in the trash can that is sitting next to the toilet and underneath the toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bottle of soap into a trash can

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the front of the toilet.
Pick up the soap dispenser from the side of the bathtub.
Walk to the left side of the toilet.
Put the soap dispenser in the trash can next to the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a soap dispenser in the trash.

high_descs: Walk to the dresser on your left.
Grab a bottle from the dresser.
Go to the trash can behind you.
Put the bottle in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Throw away a bottle.

high_descs: Turn left to face the cabinet.
Pick up the soap bottle on top of the cabinet.
Turn around and move forward to the wall, then turn right to face the toilet.
Put the soap bottle in the trash next to the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a soap bottle in the trash.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the white cabinet.
Pick the gray bottle up from behind the tissue box on the white table.
Turn around and cross the room and turn to the right to face the toilet.
Put the bottle in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bottle in the trash can.

high_descs: Move slightly right to face towards the sink.
Take the soap bar in the basin of the sink.
Turn left to face the tub.
Put the soap bar in between the rags in the tub.
Turn right, go to the sink.
Take the soap bar on the rim of the sink.
Turn left to face the tub.
Put the soap bar below the rag to the right.
tasks.task_desc: Put bars of soap in a bath tub.

high_descs: Turn left and begin walking across the room, then turn left again and walk up to the tub.
Pick up the bar of soap that is in the tub.
Turn around and take a step forward, then turn left and walk up to the sink.
Place the bar of soap into the sink basin, then turn on the water, after a couple seconds turn the water off and remove the now clean bar of soap.
Turn around and take a step forward, then turn right and walk up to the tub.
Place the clean bar of soap in the middle of the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the tub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk up to the bathtub
Pick up the pink soap bar from the bathtub
Turn right and walk up to the bathroom sink
Wash the soap under water in the sink and remove it
Turn left and walk back to the bathtub
Put the soap bar in the bathtub
tasks.task_desc: Put the washed soap bar in the bathtub

high_descs: turn to the left and go forward a few steps and turn to the left and go to the bath tub
pick up the pink bar of soap from the bath tub
turn to the right twice and take a few steps forward and turn to the left and step to the sink
put the soap in the sink and turn on the water to fill the sink and turn off and drain the water and pick up the soap
turn to the left twice and take a step and turn to the right and go to the bath tub
put the soap in the bath tub
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet bar of soap in a bath tub

high_descs: turn left and walk over to the bathtub on the left
grab the soap out of the bathtub
turn around and walk to the bathroom sink on the left
place the soap inside the sink and wash it off
turn left and walk back over to the bathtub
place the soap inside of the bathtub
tasks.task_desc: place rinsed off soap inside of the bathtub

high_descs: Turn around and find the black sink.
Pick up the bar of soap from the sink.
Take the soap, and take a step backward.
Place the soap in the sink and turn the water on. Turn the water off and pick up the soap.
Turn to the left and face the bath tub.
Put the soap inside the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Move the soap from the sink to the tub.

high_descs: turn right, turn left, and walk to the black sink
pick up the right bar of soap
look down at the black sink
place the bar of soap into the sink, turn on the water, turn off the water, pick up the bar of soap from the black sink
turn left and walk to the bath tub
place the bar of soap in to the bath tub
tasks.task_desc: wet a bar of soap, place it in the bath tub

high_descs: Turn and face the right side of the sink.
Pick the pink soap on the right side of the sink up.
Move back from the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, turn the water on and then off and pick up the soap.
Turn and stand in front of the bath tub.
Put the soap in the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put clean soap in the bath tub.

high_descs: Turn left and walk up to the side of the toilet
Pick up the soap bar from the top of the toilet
Turn right and walk across to the sink
Rinse the soap under running water in the sink then remove it
Turn left and face the bathtub
Put the soap bar in the bathtub
tasks.task_desc: Put the cleaned soap bar in the bathtub

high_descs: Turn to the left and head to the toilet.
Pick up the soap on the toilet.
Bring the soap to the sink on the right.
Wet the soap in the sink with water.
Bring the soap to the tub to the left.
Put the soap in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put wet soap in the tub.

high_descs: Back up toward the wall behind you and turn to the toilet on your left.
Pick up the pink bar of soap.
Turn to the right and go toward the sink.
Put the soap into the sink and turn the water on.
Pick up the soap and turn to the left toward the bath tub.
Place the soap in the tub,
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap it in the tub.

high_descs: turn left, turn left, walk to the tub
grab the paper roll at the edge of the tub
turn left to the toilet
put the paper roll on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move the paper roll from the tub to the toilet

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the bathtub.
Pick up the toilet paper on the side of the tub.
Turn to the left, walk to the toilet.
Place the toilet paper behind the blue spray bottle on the edge of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Place toilet paper on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to the left and walk towards the table. Make a left and walk towards the tub.
Pick up the toilet paper that is sitting on the tub.
Raise it up and turn around. Take a step and turn to the right facing the toilet. Raise the toilet paper higher up.
Place the toilet paper on the toilet slightly behind the right spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: To move the toilet paper from the tub to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Go slightly to the left and turn left to go to the bath tub
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll from the edge of the bath tub.
turn around, walk slightly left and turn right to go to the toilet.
Put the empty toilet paper roll between the bottle and the candle on top of the water tank.
tasks.task_desc: Put the empty toilet paper roll between the bottle and the candle on top of the water tank.

high_descs: Proceed to tub straight ahead.
Pick up cup from tub side, in front of cloth on right.
Turn left, proceed to toilet.
Place cup on back of toilet, between candle and pump bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Move cup from tub to back of toilet.

high_descs: move to the tub ahead of you
pick up a roll of toilet paper
move to the left to the toilet
put the roll on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Put a roll of toilet paper on the toilet.

high_descs: turn right, walk towards tub, turn left to face toilet
pick up the candle that is on the edge of the tub
turn left, take a couple steps, turn right to face toilet
put the candle on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move candle from tub to back of toilet

high_descs: Take a few steps to the right to find the plunger.
Pick up the candle from the bath tub.
Carry the candle a few steps to the left.
Place the candle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle from the tub to the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the left side of the toilet.
Pick the candle up from the side of the tub.
Move left to face the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of a toilet.

high_descs: Turn around to face the small cabinet.
Pick up the candle on top of the cabinet.
Turn around, turn right to face the tub, and turn left to face the toilet.
Place the candle on top of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Place the candle on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and face the white cabinet to the right of the sink.
Pick the candle up from the cabinet.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around completely and walk up to the small white stand.
Pick up the candle that is closest to you.
Turn completely around and head back over to the toilet.
Place the candlestick in front of the third blue bottle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candlestick to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Go toward the wall, turn left, go to the small white dresser, and turn right.
Take a candle from the small white dresser.
Turn left, go to the bath tub, turn left, and go to the toilet.
Put the candle on the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle on the toilet.

high_descs: Walk forward and left to the small cabinet right of the sink
Pick up the left most candle from the cabinet
Turn around and walk up to the toilet
Put the candle down on top of the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Put the candle on the toilet

high_descs: Move to the left and face the white stand next to the sink.
Pick the candle up from the back left corner.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the right of the mirror facing the towel holder on the wall
Pick up the hand towel on the towel holder on the wall
Carry the hand towel straight back to the bath tub
Place the hand towel inside of the bath tub
tasks.task_desc: Move a hand towel to the bath tub

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room to face the towel on the wall.
Pull the towel off of the hanger on the wall.
Turn left and walk forward to face the bath tub.
Place the towel in the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: To move a towel from the hanger to the bath tub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the small white table then take a step to your left.
Grab the towel that's on the ring on the wall.
Turn around and take a small step then turn right and walk to the tub.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in the tub.

high_descs: move to right of the sink to the left
pick up a rag from the ring
move to the tub to the left
put the rag in the tub
tasks.task_desc: Put a rag in the tub.

high_descs: Turn left, walk forward a few steps, then turn right to face the towel holder on the wall.
Take the towel off the towel holder that is on the wall.
Turn to your left and walk over to the bathtub.
Place the towel down in the middle of the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Move a towel from the towel holder to the bathtub.

high_descs: turn around, take two steps, turn right, take a few steps, turn right to face the towel rack on the right
take the towel down from the towel rack
turn around, take two steps, turn right, walk to the tub
put the towel in the tub
tasks.task_desc: move the towel from the wall to the tub

high_descs: Turn around walk to the toilet and face it
pick up the candle that was on the tub
move in front of the toilet and face it
place the candle on top of the toilet lid in front of the left spray
turn around and face the sink that was behind you
pick up the other candle that was on the tub's edge
turn around and face the toilet
place the candle to the left of the other candle that is on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: pick up both candles that are on the tub and move them to the top of the toilet by the left spray.

high_descs: Turn right and walk up to the bathtub
Pick up the right most candle from the edge of the bathtub
Turn right to face toward the toilet
Put the candle on top of the back of the toilet
Turn to look back at the bathtub
Pick up the nearest candle on the edge of the bathtub
Turn to face the toilet
Put the candle on top of the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Put the candles on the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and find the holder on the wall.
Take the towel off of the holder.
Carry the towel and move a few steps to the left to face the bath tub.
Place the towel inside the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a towel in the bath tub.

high_descs: Move across the room to the towel holder on the wall to the right of the mirror
Pick up the hand towel on top of the towel ring
Carry the towel to the bath tub
Place the hand towel in the middle of the tub
tasks.task_desc: Move a hand towel to the tub

high_descs: Move to the left and face the white towel hanging to the right of the mirror.
Take the towel down from the towel ring.
Turn to the left and face the tub.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in a tub.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the tub
Pick up the wash cloth on the right
Turn around, walk to the sink
Put the cloth in the sink, pick the cloth up again
Turn around, walk to the toilet
Put the cloth on the toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: Retrieve a cloth from the tub, put the cloth in the sink, put the same cloth on the toilet tank.

high_descs: walk to face bath tub basin
pick up black rag on right from tub basin
turn to face sink
wash rag in sink, remove rag from sink
walk to face toilet
put rag on toilet tank top
tasks.task_desc: put a washed rag on top of toilet tank

high_descs: turn around and walk over to the right side of the bathroom tub
grab a dirty wash cloth out of the bathroom tub
turn right and walk over to the right side of the bathroom sink
rinse off the dirty cloth inside the sink, then pick it back up
turn around and walk over to the toilet at the end of the room
place the cloth on top of the back side of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: place a clean wash cloth on top of the toilet

high_descs: Go to the sink to the left.
Take the bar of soap to the left of the faucet.
Turn left to the bath tub.
Put the bar of soap in the middle of the bath tub.
Turn right to the sink.
Take the bar of soap to the right of the faucet.
Turn left to the bath tub.
Put the bar of soap to the right of the bar of soap in the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put bars of soap in a bath tub.
